about hien

Hien is a Web Developer based in Southern California. She recently graduated from LearningFuze's Immersive Web Development Program. She holds a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration with a concentration in Information Systems from Cal Poly, San Luis Obispo. She's dedicated to developing accessible, user-friendly websites that engage users through responsive design and creative flairs. This is her personal space to showcase her work.

When she's not coding, you can find her exploring nature or working on her jewelry brand, Lucky Dreamer.
